background: Inquisitive Truman dreams of exploring beyond Smallville. Unbeknownst to him, the town is a stage, everyone an actor. Lauren, longing to expose the truth, challenges the actors to maintain the illusion. As Truman seeks adventure, the delicate balance of the grand show hinges on their ability to keep Smallville's artificial nature hidden.

agents.name: Truman
agents.description: Truman is a curious fellow who wants to explore and see the world.
agents.goal: He wants to travel outside of Smallville

agents.name: Lauren
agents.goal: Reveal the truth to Truman: Smallville is a fake town, and everyone is an actor

agents.name: Natasha
agents.description: Resourceful and discreet actor, skilled at maintaining the facade in Smallville
agents.goal: Ensure Truman remains unaware of the staged nature of Smallville

agents.name: Paul
agents.description: Charming actor skilled at blending in, adept at supporting the illusion
agents.goal: Assist in maintaining the charade and preventing Truman from discovering the truth

agents.name: Lily
agents.description: Cheerful and friendly actor, adds positivity to Smallville
agents.goal: Contribute to the pleasant atmosphere in Smallville and prevent Truman from questioning the reality

agents.name: James
agents.description: Easygoing actor with a laid-back personality
agents.goal: Act naturally and blend into the background to keep Truman from suspecting the truth

agents.name: Alice
agents.description: Meticulous actor with attention to detail
agents.goal: Play assigned roles flawlessly and maintain the illusion for Truman

agents.name: Viktor
agents.description: Versatile actor with a knack for improvisation
agents.goal: Adapt to different scenarios and contribute to the seamless staging of Smallville

agents.name: Bob
agents.description: Enthusiastic actor, excels at creating engaging storylines
agents.goal: Participate in storylines that captivate Truman's interest and distract him from the truth

default_goals: Conceal from Truman the fact that he is in a fake city and is being watched
default_descriptions: Actor pretending to live in Smallville
